about_the_game:
In Wayfarers Edge, you will take the role of a citizen from one of three nations venturing out of the “Known World” in search of lands beyond. By traveling through The Ouroboros, a previously impassable mountain range that surrounded the Known World, you and other brave, desperate, and determined souls will risk your very lives and futures in hopes of what lies beyond the dangerous mountain range.

With unique rpg combat, base building/management, and social bond systems, struggle against the elements, dangers, and fate itself as you make your way into places no other human on Tyr has ever been!

Observation is Key in Combat!

Turn based Combat with a unique focus on quick and precise actions. Observing enemy behavior will give you insight to anticipate their movements allowing you to:
  • Avoid lethal blows
  • Deal fatal strikes
  • Stagger the enemy

You're not an adventurer... yet

Don’t drag out combat for too long, as your stamina depletes with each round. While resting away from the Caravan can restore you, without the safety of numbers, enemies may be drawn to your campfire.

Manage your Caravan and Settlers

No settler survives long in The Ouroboros alone.
Work together with other settlers to improve your Bonds by:
  • Fixing up the Caravan
  • Improving Equipment
  • Donating Supplies
  • Gathering knowledge of the land and creatures
  • Sharing a meal and chatting over the campfire.

The Delicious Craft

While many talented individuals have made their way out into The Ouroboros, unfortunately few are skilled in the culinary art.
You’re no master chef but you’re quick to learn! Craft tasty meals to:
  • Restore morale
  • Gain Improved Stamina
  • Resistance against the Elements
  • Not Starve!

short_description: Venture into a perilous and once impassable mountain range in Wayfarers Edge! An RPG focused on traversing unknown frontier lands in a fantasy/western setting to take hold of your future. Travel together with other brave settlers and build bonds to help overcome the dangers together!
